Claim: "A large group of people walk in a busy city at night."
Referring expressions: A large group of people, busy city, night.  People, city
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsLarge(a) and IsBusy(b) and IsAtNight(c)))) & (forall f (forall g (  IsBusy(f) ->   IsInCity(g)))) & (forall i (forall h (  IsInCity(h) ->   IsBusy(i))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsWalk(d) and IsInCity(e))))
